about_the_game:
Always Higher is a single-player sci-fi adventure shooter.

The future semi-destroyed world is divided into hundreds of districts competing with each other. The central government is weak. As the final encounter is approaching, confrontation between the two leading groups gets fierce. The only three things you know are that you are an agent infiltrated into the enemy’s secret laboratory with the aim to steal important data, that you need to escape, and that yours is a good cause. But if it is so, why don’t you remember anything else?

Always Higher Demo includes one entirely new training level. It demonstrates basic game mechanics and battle system.
